mapper.insert: INSERT INTO humiture_info (mac_address, temperature, humidity) VALUES (#{macAddress}, #{temperature}, #{humidity})
mapper.select: SELECT a.mac_address, building_num, location, collect_time, temperature ,humidity FROM sensors_info a INNER JOIN humiture_info b ON a.mac_address = b.mac_address WHERE a.building_num = #{buildingNum} AND collect_time >= #{dawnTime} ORDER BY collect_time DESC
